location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 21 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire, to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter conveys the Resident's concerns respecting the current efficiency of the crews serving the Indian Navy in the Persian Gulf, and complains that the same ships are better manned when performing duties in other quarters; a solution to the problem is expressed within.
